name: 10-Second Bomb Squad
description:
Introduction

Welcome to the Squad! Use your mouse to rewire these explosive devices so they don’t detonate when the timer reaches 0. You’ll know if you’ve done it incorrectly.

Take 10 seconds to familiarize yourself with the example explosive device below. Don’t take longer than that. Trust me.

Not Working?
  • The game may not run properly on Chrome (“serviceWorker” error). Until I can fix that, please try using Firefox or Explorer.
Details
  • This is my first LD game jam, but my second jam in all.
  • Engine: Godot 3.5.1
  • Art: Aseprite
  • Sounds: Audacity and sfxr
